description:
==============================================================

EXTREMELY USEFUL TO UNDERSTAND THE R12 INVENTORY CONCEPTS

===============================================================

At the end of this course, you will get the knowledge of...

Basic Concepts of Oracle eBusiness,

Overview of Oracle Inventory,

The Multi-Org and its Usage in eBusiness,

Working with R12 Inventory in Oracle application,

Concept of costing and its Impact on Transactions,

Period Opening and Closing,

Setting up Inventory Module,

Defining items and assigning,

Inventory transactions,

Inventory controls,

Inventory planning,

Inventory accuracy,

On-Hand Availability and On-Hand Quantity.
title: Oracle Applications R12 Inventory - Fundamentals & Advance
